author_name: R I T H I K R A J
text: Peoples in arkema they all are so kind and then all following 100% safety with their jobs while handling any equipments.

Biggest integrated bio-factory in the world dedicated to high performance polymer production of Amino 11 and its flagship Rilsan® polyamide 11 at this new plant on Jurong Island, Singapore.
This plant, for which production will be 100%-derived from renewable castor beans, represents a 50% increase in Arkema’s global polyamide 11 capacity.
Plant designed and built to the highest standards.
